example.code:
# Use this method to set the report path to "../reports":
ds.report_path("../reports")

path.description: The path where to save reports, relative or absolute.

stack.description: Store a chart in the report stack.

example.code:
# Use this method to store a chart with a title and description:
ds.store_chart(chart_obj, title="My Chart", description="This chart shows...")

title.description: The chart title. Defaults to None.

description.description: The chart description. Defaults to None.
